verses.verse: <S%H4100>Why<s%> dost Thou <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? Why dost Thou <S%H5956>hide<s%> [Thyself] in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>?

In <S%H1346>pride<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1814>hotly<s%> <S%H1814>pursue<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted;<s%> Let them be <S%H8610>caught<s%> in the <S%H4209>plots<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they have <S%H2803>devised.<s%>
For the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1984>boasts<s%> of his heart's <S%H8378>desire,<s%> And the <S%H1214>greedy<s%> <S%H1214>man<s%> <S%H1288>curses<s%> [and] <S%H5006>spurns<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

The <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> in the <S%H1363>haughtiness<s%> of his <S%H639>countenance,<s%> does not <S%H1875>seek<s%> [Him.] <S%H3605>All<s%> his <S%H4209>thoughts<s%> are, <S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

His <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H2342>prosper<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times;<s%> Thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are on <S%H4791>high,<s%> out of his <S%H5048>sight;<s%> As for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6887>adversaries,<s%> he <S%H6315>snorts<s%> at them.
He <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H3820>himself,<s%> "I shall not be <S%H4131>moved;<s%> Throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%> I shall not be in <S%H9563>adversity.<s%>"

His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H423>curses<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%> and <S%H8496>oppression;<s%> <S%H8478>Under<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H205>wickedness.<s%>

He <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H3993>lurking<s%> <S%H3993>places<s%> of the <S%H9161>villages;<s%> In the <S%H4565>hiding<s%> <S%H4565>places<s%> he <S%H2026>kills<s%> the <S%H9345>innocent;<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6845>stealthily<s%> <S%H6845>watch<s%> for the <S%H2489>unfortunate.<s%>

He <S%H693>lurks<s%> in a <S%H4565>hiding<s%> <S%H4565>place<s%> as a <S%H9030>lion<s%> in his <S%H5520>lair;<s%> He <S%H693>lurks<s%> to <S%H2414>catch<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted;<s%> He <S%H2414>catches<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> when he <S%H4900>draws<s%> him into his <S%H7568>net.<s%>
He <S%H1794>crouches,<s%> he <S%H7817>bows<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> And the <S%H2489>unfortunate<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> by his <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H6099>ones.<s%>

He <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H3820>himself,<s%> <S%H410>"God<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten;<s%> He has <S%H5641>hidden<s%> His <S%H6440>face;<s%> He will <S%H1077>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it."
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> O <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up Thy <S%H3027>hand.<s%> Do not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H6035>afflicted.<s%>
<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5006>spurned<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>? He has <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>himself,<s%> "Thou wilt not <S%H1875>require<s%> [it]."

Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> [it], for Thou hast <S%H5027>beheld<s%> <S%H5999>mischief<s%> and <S%H3708>vexation<s%> to <S%H5414>take<s%> it into Thy <S%H3027>hand.<s%> The <S%H2489>unfortunate<s%> <S%H5800>commits<s%> [himself] to Thee; Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> the <S%H5826>helper<s%> of the <S%H3490>orphan.<s%>

<S%H7665>Break<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H7451>evildoer,<s%> <S%H1875>Seek<s%> out his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> until Thou dost <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1077>none.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever;<s%> <S%H1471>Nations<s%> have perished from His <S%H6>land.<s%>

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6035>humble;<s%> Thou wilt <S%H3559>strengthen<s%> their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Thou wilt <S%H7181>incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%>

To <S%H8199>vindicate<s%> the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> and the <S%H1790>oppressed,<s%> That <S%H582>man<s%> who is of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H6206>cause<s%> <S%H6206>terror<s%> <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%> <S%H5750><s%>
